mapper.insert: insert into give_away_sheet (id, sale_sheet_id, remark, state, create_time, total_amount) values (#{id}, #{saleSheetId}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{totalAmount})

insert into give_away_sheet_content (id, give_away_sheet_id, pid, quantity, unit_price, total_price, remark) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.giveAwaySheetId}, #{item.pid}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.totalPrice}, #{item.remark})
mapper.select: select * from give_away_sheet order by id desc limit 0, 1
